name: illustratively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that helps to explain something, especially by giving an example: Historical documentaries often use archival images illustratively, as background to descriptions of past events. The quotes selected were those that most illustratively reflected the key issues.
More examplesFewer examplesVarious possible patterns of volume change have been illustratively reported.Oxygen pressure in a container can be limited in any suitable manner, illustratively by placing nitrogen in the container.Any standard methodology can be used for this. Illustratively, a study can be performed using a group of healthy adult subjects.
